name: JCB Pioneer: Mars
description: JCB Pioneer: Mars drops you onto the surface of The Red Planet. Your mission: To survive and prepare Mars for future human colonization.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit (or later) Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Modern Dedicated Graphics Card Storage: 16 GB available space Additional Notes: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit (or later) Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Modern Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: TBD MB available space
